name: Boy and Bee
description:
An adventure of Boy and Bee! Lost and confused, guide Boy and Bee to an escape, using teamwork to navigate the world.

Controls (Keyboard):

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space Bar
  • Switch Characters: B key
  • Start Game / Pause: Enter key

Controls (Gamepad):


Collect the treasure and make your escape!
